Description: Pottery ostracon bearing 5 lines of Greek text containg an invocation of the holy Trinity. The pottery is a body sherd of utility Ware U5.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr William Yewdale Adams
Bibliographic references: Adams 2002 / Merinarti III: The Late and Terminal Christian Phases (118)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (395068) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/395068)
